title: I Built an Award-Winning Website in 15 Minutes using Google's Antigravity (0 Coding)
description:
Most creative agencies would charge $50,000+ for a 3D "Scrollytelling" landing page. Today, I built one in under 15 minutes, completely for free.
In this video, I’m testing Google’s new Agentic IDE, Antigravity. We aren't just generating code; we are building a full asset pipeline. I’ll show you how to generate consistent product keyframes with Google Whisk, animate them with Google Flow, and use a dual-agent workflow (Gemini 3.0 + Claude 4.5) to write production-ready Next.js & Framer Motion code.
If you are still manually coding scroll animations in 2026, you are working too hard.

🔗 THE PROMPT & PROJECT FILES:
Get the exact System Prompt, asset workflow, and code snippets here:
👉 https://www.notion.so/I-Built-an-Award-Winning-Website-in-15-Minutes-0-Coding-2d6fab5f074a8019bf1aed4fd2354922

🛠️ TOOLS USED:
Google Antigravity (IDE)
Google Whisk (Image Generation)
Google Flow (Video Generation)
Ezgif (Sequence Conversion)

⏱️ TIMESTAMPS:
0:00 - The Result (Zenith X Exploded View)
0:57 - Generating Consistent Keyframes (Whisk)
2:15 - AI Motion & Physics (Flow)
2:55 - Converting for Web Performance(Ezgif)
3:41 - The Antigravity Build (Gemini 3.0)
4:18 - Final Result & Code Audit

🎵 MUSIC:
Blue Boi by LAKEY INSPIRED
License: Creative Commons Attribution 3.0

👋 ABOUT ME:
I'm Sameer. I explore the intersection of Full-Stack Engineering, AI, and the Singularity. I build real systems to see what these models are actually capable of.
#GoogleAntigravity #AICoding #Nextjs #WebDesign #Gemini3 #SoftwareEngineering
